properties.name: thymeleaflet.preview.background-light
properties.description: Light background color for the preview canvas

properties.name: thymeleaflet.preview.background-dark
properties.description: Dark background color for the preview canvas

properties.name: thymeleaflet.preview.viewports
properties.description: Viewport presets (name + width + height), excluding Fit

properties.name: thymeleaflet.security.auto-permit
properties.description: When true, registers a minimal SecurityFilterChain to permit /thymeleaflet/**
